asset.prompt: A cinematic, hyper-detailed, slightly unsettling shot of a dilapidated, gothic haunted house perched atop a craggy hill. Cobwebs drape from the eaves, and an eerie yellow light glows from a single window. A rickety wooden bridge leads towards it over a dark chasm. The style is 90s spooky, with a Dutch angle and dramatic, moody lighting.
